Class CtcLoss.Inputs<T extends TNumber>

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.RawOpInputs<CtcLoss<T>>
org.tensorflow.op.nn.CtcLoss.Inputs<T>
Enclosing class:
CtcLoss<T extends TNumber>
public static class CtcLoss.Inputs<T extends TNumber> extends RawOpInputs<CtcLoss<T>>

  • Field Details

    • inputs

      public final Operand<T extends TNumber> inputs
      3-D, shape: (max_time x batch_size x num_classes), the logits.

    • labelsIndices

      public final Operand<TInt64> labelsIndices
      The indices of a SparseTensor<int32, 2>. labels_indices(i, :) == [b, t] means labels_values(i) stores the id for (batch b, time t).

    • labelsValues

      public final Operand<TInt32> labelsValues
      The values (labels) associated with the given batch and time.

    • sequenceLength

      public final Operand<TInt32> sequenceLength
      A vector containing sequence lengths (batch).

    • preprocessCollapseRepeated

      public final boolean preprocessCollapseRepeated
      Scalar, if true then repeated labels are collapsed prior to the CTC calculation.

    • ctcMergeRepeated

      public final boolean ctcMergeRepeated
      Scalar. If set to false, during CTC calculation repeated non-blank labels will not be merged and are interpreted as individual labels. This is a simplified version of CTC.

    • ignoreLongerOutputsThanInputs

      public final boolean ignoreLongerOutputsThanInputs
      Scalar. If set to true, during CTC calculation, items that have longer output sequences than input sequences are skipped: they don't contribute to the loss term and have zero-gradient.

    • T

      public final DataType T
      The T attribute

  • Constructor Details

    • Inputs

      public Inputs(GraphOperation op)
